advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.bloody.title: 血淋淋的!
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.coffea.description: 在灰化土，泥巴或者灵魂土上种植咖啡树
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.coffea.title: 需营养咖啡树
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.coffee_era.title: 咖啡世代
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.enthusiastic.description: 食用所有妖怪们的归家的食物
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.enthusiastic.title: 幻想乡美食家
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.flesh.title: 这是啥?
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.fragrant.title: 香喷喷的!
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.hmm.title: 嗯姆...是这样吗?
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.mousse.title: 嗯...啊?刚刚发生什么了?
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.q_grader.title: 咖啡大师
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.redbean.description: 在砂土，泥巴或者粘土上种植红豆
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.redbean.title: 耐瘠薄赤小豆
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.soybean.title: 不可或缺的作物
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.sweet.title: 甜嘛?
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.tea.title: 清闲的副业
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.welcome_to_youkais_homecoming.descriptio: 欢迎来到妖怪们的归家
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.welcome_to_youkais_homecoming.title: 妖怪们的归家
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.powerful_being.title: 是异变啊!灵梦!
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.monstrosity.title: 汉尼拔
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.tea_master.title: 小罐茶，大师作
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.first_time.title: 小心灵梦
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.udumbara.description: 种植幻昙华。这种植物在月光下成长，在阳光下枯萎
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.udumbara.title: 月光作物
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.udumbara_flower.description: 获得幻昙花。幻昙华只在满月夜的月光下开花，开花10秒之后花将会凋谢
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.udumbara_flower.title: 昙花一现
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.koishi_hat.description: 和恋恋玩，获取帽子先生
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.koishi_hat.title: 钢盔
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.mary_call.description: 半妖怪化状态下在下界被恋恋打电话
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.mary_call.title: 这里是玛丽小姐～
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.suwako_hat.description: 收集信仰获取诹访子的帽子
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.suwako_hat.title: 信仰收集
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.suwako_wear.description: 在半妖怪化或者妖怪化状态下给青蛙带草帽
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.suwako_wear.title: 祟神之路
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.lost_memories.description: 露米娅受到40点以上的伤害时会变化为Ex露米娅。用弹幕击败Ex露米娅并获得露米娅的发带
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.lost_memories.title: 失落的记忆
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.spellcard_power.description: 你在村民面前吃人肉时灵梦会出现并试图治退你。击败灵梦并获得她的符卡
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.spellcard_power.title: 赤色杀人魔
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.trade_danmaku.description: 妖怪化状态下和露米娅交易获取弹幕
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.trade_danmaku.title: 可口的交易
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.alcoholic.description: 使用发酵桶酿酒并喝酒获得醉酒效果
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.alcoholic.title: 嗜酒如命
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.passed_out.description: 不断喝酒直到醉酒效果堆叠到最高级
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.passed_out.title: 烂醉如泥
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.feed_reimu.description: 投喂灵梦妖怪归家中所有正常的食物，灵梦会给你她的大蝴蝶结作为谢礼
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.feed_reimu.title: 满足的灵梦
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.cucumber.title: 翠绿色的新生
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.cucumber_top.description: 让黄瓜藤蔓攀爬绳子并长到3格高，然后收获最顶层的黄瓜
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.cucumber_top.title: 河童之里
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.grape.title: 甜蜜的藤蔓作物
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.grape_cut.description: 修剪一株成熟葡萄藤的枝叶，使其能够长得更大。记得在上方放置一排绳子，让新生的藤蔓有地方攀爬
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.grape_cut.title: 欲戴其冠，必承其重
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.grape_harvest.description: 收获葡萄枝条下挂着的葡萄果实
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.grape_harvest.title: 苦后甘来
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.squeeze.description: 在木盆中跳跃榨取葡萄汁
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.squeeze.title: 糯香葡萄汁
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.cuisine_board.title: 寿司学徒
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.foreign_sushi_master.description: 制作彩虹加州卷切片和铁火加州卷切片
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.foreign_sushi_master.title: 出口转内销
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.kaguya_hime.title: 竹中公主的故事
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.small_pot.title: 归家暖意
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.sushi_master.description: 制作金枪鱼大腹握寿司,夜雀的手握,鱼籽军舰,缤纷太卷切片
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.sushi_master.title: 寿司仙人
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.max_steamer.description: 在第十八层蒸笼蒸一个物品
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.max_steamer.title: 十八层竹塔
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.steamer.title: 蒸汽腾腾
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.dish.description: 蒸一份盘装或竹筒菜。注意他们会严重阻碍蒸汽流动，导致别的蒸笼蒸得更慢
advancements.youkaishomecoming.advanceme.dish.title: 蒸汽拦路虎
